insert into compliancehousehold(reshid,reshstartdate,reshprojectmoveindate,ossiteid)
select reshid,leamoveindate,leamoveindate,cs.udfgetsiteid() from Lease where codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and priorleaseid is null

go

Delete from AnnualNoticeDefinitionRecertification where AnnualRecertificationID in
(select ID  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid ))

Delete  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid )

delete C1
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid

go

insert into annualrecertification(compliancehouseholdid,oneid,ossiteid)
select chid,41,cs.udfgetsiteid() from compliancehousehold where chid not in (select compliancehouseholdid from annualrecertification where oneid = <ID>)

go

update CH
set reshprojectmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
,reshmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and L.priorleaseid is null

go

update CH
set reshrhsnextannualdate = dateadd(yy,1,C.effectivedate)
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join RHCertification C
on CH.reshid = C.residenthouseholdid
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid and C.residenthouseholdid = CH.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (5, 6) and L.nextleaseid is null and L.leainactivedate is null
and CH.reshstartdate = (select top 1 reshstartdate from Compliancehousehold where reshid = CH.reshid order by reshstartdate desc)
and C.id = (select top 1 id from RHcertification where residenthouseholdid = CH.reshid and Actionid in ('I','R') and statusid = '<TEXT>' order by effectivedate desc)

go

update AR
set effective = CH.reshrhsnextannualdate
from AnnualRecertification AR
inner join compliancehousehold CH
on AR.compliancehouseholdid = CH.chid
where AR.oneid = <ID>

go

insert into compliancehousehold(reshid,reshstartdate,reshprojectmoveindate,ossiteid)
select reshid,leamoveindate,leamoveindate,cs.udfgetsiteid() from Lease where codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and priorleaseid is null

go

Delete from AnnualNoticeDefinitionRecertification where AnnualRecertificationID in
(select ID  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid ))

Delete  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid )

delete C1
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid

go

insert into annualrecertification(compliancehouseholdid,oneid,ossiteid)
select chid,6,cs.udfgetsiteid() from compliancehousehold where chid not in (select compliancehouseholdid from annualrecertification where oneid = <ID>)

insert into annualrecertification(compliancehouseholdid,oneid,ossiteid)
select chid,34,cs.udfgetsiteid() from compliancehousehold where chid not in (select compliancehouseholdid from annualrecertification where oneid = <ID>)

update CH
set reshprojectmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
,reshmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and L.priorleaseid is null

go

update CH
set reshhudnextannualdate = dateadd(yy,1,C.crteffectivedate)
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Certification C
on CH.reshid = C.reshid
inner join Certsummary CS
on C.crtid = CS.crtid
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid and C.reshid = CH.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (5, 6) and L.nextleaseid is null and L.leainactivedate is null
and CH.reshstartdate = (select top 1 reshstartdate from Compliancehousehold where reshid = CH.reshid order by reshstartdate desc)
and C.crtid = (select top 1 crtid from certification where reshid = CH.reshid and codeactiontypecode in ('MI','AR') and crtownersigneddate is not null order by crteffectivedate desc)

go

update Compliancehousehold
set reshhudnextannualdate = datefromparts(year(reshhudnextannualdate), month(reshhudnextannualdate), 1)
where day(reshhudnextannualdate)>1

go

update AR
set effective = CH.reshhudnextannualdate
from AnnualRecertification AR
inner join compliancehousehold CH
on AR.compliancehouseholdid = CH.chid
where AR.oneid = <ID>

go

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- <CUSTOMER_NAME>
set reshtcnextannualdate = dateadd(yy,1,TC.tcceffectivedate)
from compliancehousehold CH
inner join TCCertification TC
on CH.reshid = TC.reshid
where CH.reshstartdate = (select top 1 reshstartdate from compliancehousehold where reshid = CH.reshid order by reshstartdate desc)
and TC.tccid = (select top 1 tccid from TCCertification where reshid = TC.reshid and rsid = <ID> and rtid IN (<ID>, <ID>) order by tcceffectivedate desc)

go


update Compliancehousehold
set reshtcnextannualdate = datefromparts(year(reshtcnextannualdate), month(reshtcnextannualdate), 1)
where day(reshtcnextannualdate)>1

go

update AR
set effective = CH.reshtcnextannualdate
from AnnualRecertification AR
inner join compliancehousehold CH
on AR.compliancehouseholdid = CH.chid
where AR.oneid = <ID>

go

--- CustomerDelta

Declare @PropertyDate datetime

SELECT @PropertyDate = CONVERT(varchar(10), arsDailyCtlDate, <ID>)
FROM AccountsReceivableSetting (NOLOCK)

INSERT INTO FASSubjRevisionHistory (UnitID, leaID, reshID, subjID, UserID, FASSubJStatus, FASBalance, ModifyDate, PropertyDate, reshComment, FASComment, RevisionReason,OSSiteID)
SELECT            DISTINCT
            l.UnitID,
            l.leaID,
            l.reshID,
            sj.subjID,
            l.LastUserID,
            CASE
                        WHEN l.leaSODAStatus IS NULL THEN 1
                        WHEN l.leaSODAStatus = 'C' THEN 0
                        ELSE 0
            END AS FASSubJStatus,
            ISNULL(rb.rhbRentJourBal, 0) AS FASBalnce,
            GETDATE() AS ModifyDate,
            @PropertyDate,
            rm.resmLastName + ',' + rm.resmFirstName + isnull('-' + sj.subjName,'') AS reshComment,
            CASE
                        WHEN l.leaSODAStatus IS NULL THEN 'SampleValue'
                        WHEN l.leaSODAStatus = 'C' THEN 'SampleValue'
                        ELSE 'SampleName'
            END AS FASComment,
            '' AS RevisionReason,
			'<ID>'--- PropertyBeta
 FROM  Lease l
            INNER JOIN ResidentMemberLease AS rml ON (l.leaID = rml.leaID AND rml.codeRelationshipcode = 'H' AND rml.rmlActiveBit = 1 AND l.codeLeaseStatusCode IN (4, 7) AND l.NextLeaseID IS NULL)
            INNER JOIN ResidentMember rm ON (rm.resmID = rml.resmID)
            FULL JOIN Subjournals sj ON sj.subjID = sj.subjID
            LEFT OUTER JOIN reshBalance rb ON (l.reshID = rb.reshID AND ISNULL(sj.subjID,0) = ISNULL(rb.subjID, 0))
            LEFT OUTER JOIN FASSubjRevisionHistory h ON (h.leaID = l.leaID AND ISNULL(h.subjID, 0) = COALESCE(rb.subjID, sj.subjID, 0))
WHERE            h.fasrhID IS NULL
AND     ISNULL(sj.subjFASBit, 1) = 1

Script_Title: Accounting / Date Advance - Advance Property Date
Script_Purpose: Run this backend data-fix script to resolve a Advance Property Date issue in Accounting / Date Advance.
Script_Text_Sanitized:
use <DATABASE>
go

insert into compliancehousehold(reshid,reshstartdate,reshprojectmoveindate,ossiteid)
select reshid,leamoveindate,leamoveindate,cs.udfgetsiteid() from Lease where codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and priorleaseid is null

go

Delete from AnnualNoticeDefinitionRecertification where AnnualRecertificationID in
(select ID  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid ))

Delete  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid )

delete C1
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid

go

insert into annualrecertification(compliancehouseholdid,oneid,ossiteid)
select chid,6,cs.udfgetsiteid() from compliancehousehold where chid not in (select compliancehouseholdid from annualrecertification where oneid = <ID>)

update CH
set reshprojectmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
,reshmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and L.priorleaseid is null

go

update CH
set reshhudnextannualdate = dateadd(yy,1,C.crteffectivedate)
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Certification C
on CH.reshid = C.reshid
inner join Certsummary CS
on C.crtid = CS.crtid
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid and C.reshid = CH.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (5, 6) and L.nextleaseid is null and L.leainactivedate is null
and CH.reshstartdate = (select top 1 reshstartdate from Compliancehousehold where reshid = CH.reshid order by reshstartdate desc)
and C.crtid = (select top 1 crtid from certification where reshid = CH.reshid and codeactiontypecode in ('MI','AR') and crtownersigneddate is not null order by crteffectivedate desc)

go

update Compliancehousehold
set reshhudnextannualdate = datefromparts(year(reshhudnextannualdate), month(reshhudnextannualdate), 1)
where day(reshhudnextannualdate)>1

go

update AR
set effective = CH.reshhudnextannualdate
from AnnualRecertification AR
inner join compliancehousehold CH
on AR.compliancehouseholdid = CH.chid
where AR.oneid = <ID>

go

use <DATABASE>
go

insert into compliancehousehold(reshid,reshstartdate,reshprojectmoveindate,ossiteid)
select reshid,leamoveindate,leamoveindate,cs.udfgetsiteid() from Lease where codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and priorleaseid is null
go
Delete from AnnualNoticeDefinitionRecertification where AnnualRecertificationID in
(select ID  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid ))
Delete  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid )
delete C1
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid
go
insert into annualrecertification(compliancehouseholdid,oneid,ossiteid)
select chid,6,cs.udfgetsiteid() from compliancehousehold where chid not in (select compliancehouseholdid from annualrecertification where oneid = <ID>)
update CH
set reshprojectmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
,reshmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and L.priorleaseid is null
go
update CH
set reshhudnextannualdate = dateadd(yy,1,C.crteffectivedate)
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Certification C
on CH.reshid = C.reshid
inner join Certsummary CS
on C.crtid = CS.crtid
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid and C.reshid = CH.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (5, 6) and L.nextleaseid is null and L.leainactivedate is null
and CH.reshstartdate = (select top 1 reshstartdate from Compliancehousehold where reshid = CH.reshid order by reshstartdate desc)
and C.crtid = (select top 1 crtid from certification where reshid = CH.reshid and codeactiontypecode in ('MI','AR') and crtownersigneddate is not null order by crteffectivedate desc)
go
update Compliancehousehold
set reshhudnextannualdate = datefromparts(year(reshhudnextannualdate), month(reshhudnextannualdate), 1)
where day(reshhudnextannualdate)>1
go
update AR
set effective = CH.reshhudnextannualdate
from AnnualRecertification AR
inner join compliancehousehold CH
on AR.compliancehouseholdid = CH.chid
where AR.oneid = <ID>
go

exec uspRebuildUAH @unitID=@thisUnit, @commitBit=1, @internalSiteid = <ID>
exec uspRebuildUVH @unitID=@thisUnit, @commitBit=1, @internalSiteid = <ID>

select '<TEXT>' as [Expected Result]

--- <CUSTOMER_NAME>

Declare @<PROPERTY_NAME> datetime

SELECT @<PROPERTY_NAME> = CONVERT(varchar(10), arsDailyCtlDate, <ID>)
FROM AccountsReceivableSetting (NOLOCK)

INSERT INTO FASSubjRevisionHistory (UnitID, leaID, reshID, subjID, UserID, FASSubJStatus, FASBalance, ModifyDate, <PROPERTY_NAME>, reshComment, FASComment, RevisionReason,OSSiteID)
SELECT            DISTINCT
            l.UnitID,
            l.leaID,
            l.reshID,
            sj.subjID,
            l.LastUserID,
            CASE
                        WHEN l.leaSODAStatus IS NULL THEN 1
                        WHEN l.leaSODAStatus = 'C' THEN 0
                        ELSE 0
            END AS FASSubJStatus,
            ISNULL(rb.rhbRentJourBal, 0) AS FASBalnce,
            GETDATE() AS ModifyDate,
            @<PROPERTY_NAME>,
            rm.resmLastName + ',' + rm.resmFirstName + isnull('-' + sj.subjName,'') AS reshComment,
            CASE
                        WHEN l.leaSODAStatus IS NULL THEN '<TEXT>'
                        WHEN l.leaSODAStatus = 'C' THEN '<TEXT>'
                        ELSE '<TEXT>'
            END AS FASComment,
            '' AS RevisionReason,
			'<ID>'--- <PROPERTY_NAME>
 FROM  Lease l
            INNER JOIN ResidentMemberLease AS rml ON (l.leaID = rml.leaID AND rml.codeRelationshipcode = 'H' AND rml.rmlActiveBit = 1 AND l.codeLeaseStatusCode IN (4, 7) AND l.NextLeaseID IS NULL)
            INNER JOIN ResidentMember rm ON (rm.resmID = rml.resmID)
            FULL JOIN Subjournals sj ON sj.subjID = sj.subjID
            LEFT OUTER JOIN reshBalance rb ON (l.reshID = rb.reshID AND ISNULL(sj.subjID,0) = ISNULL(rb.subjID, 0))
            LEFT OUTER JOIN FASSubjRevisionHistory h ON (h.leaID = l.leaID AND ISNULL(h.subjID, 0) = COALESCE(rb.subjID, sj.subjID, 0))
WHERE            h.fasrhID IS NULL
AND     ISNULL(sj.subjFASBit, 1) = 1

Script_Purpose: Run this backend data-fix script to resolve a Advance Property Date issue in Accounting / Date Advance.
Script_Text_Sanitized:
use <DATABASE>
go

insert into compliancehousehold(reshid,reshstartdate,reshprojectmoveindate,ossiteid)
select reshid,leamoveindate,leamoveindate,cs.udfgetsiteid() from Lease where codeleasestatuscode in (6,7) and priorleaseid is null
go
Delete from AnnualNoticeDefinitionRecertification where AnnualRecertificationID in
(select ID  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid ))
Delete  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid )
delete C1
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid
go
insert into annualrecertification(compliancehouseholdid,oneid,ossiteid)
select chid,6,cs.udfgetsiteid() from compliancehousehold where chid not in (select compliancehouseholdid from annualrecertification where oneid = <ID>)
update CH
set reshprojectmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
,reshmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode in (6,7) and L.priorleaseid is null
go
update CH
set reshhudnextannualdate = dateadd(yy,1,C.crteffectivedate)
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Certification C
on CH.reshid = C.reshid
inner join Certsummary CS
on C.crtid = CS.crtid
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid and C.reshid = CH.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode in (5,6) and L.nextleaseid is null and L.leainactivedate is null
and CH.reshstartdate = (select top 1 reshstartdate from Compliancehousehold where reshid = CH.reshid order by reshstartdate desc)
and C.crtid = (select top 1 crtid from certification where reshid = CH.reshid and codeactiontypecode in ('MI','AR') and crtownersigneddate is not null order by crteffectivedate desc)
go
update Compliancehousehold
set reshhudnextannualdate = datefromparts(year(reshhudnextannualdate), month(reshhudnextannualdate), 1)
where day(reshhudnextannualdate)>1
go
update AR
set effective = CH.reshhudnextannualdate
from AnnualRecertification AR
inner join compliancehousehold CH
on AR.compliancehouseholdid = CH.chid
where AR.oneid = <ID>
go

Select TOP 10
	L.reshID,
	L.leaID,
	U.UnitID,
	U.UnitNumber,
	RM.resmFirstName,
	RM.resmLastName
FROM Lease L WITH (NOLOCK)
INNER JOIN ResidentMemberLease RML WITH (NOLOCK) ON RML.leaID = L.leaID
INNER JOIN ResidentMember RM WITH (NOLOCK) ON RM.resmID = RML.resmID
INNER JOIN Unit U WITH (NOLOCK) ON U.UnitID = L.UnitID
WHERE  /*RM.resmFirstName = '<NAME>' and RM.resmLastName = '<NAME>' AND*/ U.unitNumber like '<UNIT>'

/*STEP 2: RUN THIS QUERY TO FIND TRANSACTIONS WITH LONG DESCRIPTIONS

DECLARE @IPVC_RESHID NUMERIC(10,0)
SET @IPVC_RESHID = <ID> -- ExampleNote

SELECT
    t.ReshID,
    t.description
FROM ARTransaction.TransHeader t WITH (NOLOCK)
INNER JOIN dbo.Transactioncode tc WITH (NOLOCK) ON tc.trancid = t.TrancID
WHERE t.ReshID = @IPVC_RESHID
  AND LEN(t.description) > 70

*/

-- ExampleNote

-- <PROPERTY_NAME>
SELECT *
FROM ARTransaction.TransHeader WITH (NOLOCK)
WHERE LEN([description]) > 70
  AND ReshID = <RESIDENT_HOUSEHOLD_ID>  -- <PROPERTY_NAME>

-- <CUSTOMER_NAME>

Declare @LI_DATECONTROLUSED varchar(10),
		@LVC_DAILYCTLDATE varchar(10),
		@LD_DCD datetime,
		@ARPDID Numeric(10)

		select @LD_DCD = convert(datetime,ARS.arsDailyCtlDate)
		from AccountsReceivableSetting ARS WITH (NOLOCK)

		-- <PROPERTY_NAME>
	    insert into TransActivitySummary
        (Trancid, arpdid, arpsid, eopdate, periodtotal,ossiteid)
		select TA.trancid, TA.arpdid, ARPD.arpsID,ARPD.arpdMonthEndDate, sum(TA.ldtdeptransamt) as periodtotal, <ID>
		from  TransActivity TA WITH (NOLOCK), ARPeriodDetail ARPD WITH (NOLOCK)
		where TA.arpdid = ARPD.arpdid
		and   ARPD.arpdMonthEndDate < @LD_DCD
		and   TA.arpdid not in (select TAS.arpdid from TransActivitySummary TAS)
		group by ARPD.arpsID,TA.arpdid,TA.trancid,ARPD.arpdMonthEndDate
		order by ARPD.arpsID,TA.arpdid

insert into compliancehousehold(reshid,reshstartdate,reshprojectmoveindate,ossiteid)
select reshid,leamoveindate,leamoveindate,cs.udfgetsiteid() from Lease where codeleasestatuscode in (6,7) and priorleaseid is null

go

Delete from AnnualNoticeDefinitionRecertification where AnnualRecertificationID in
(select ID  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid ))

Delete  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid )

delete C1
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
 and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
 and C1.chid < C2.chid

go

insert into annualrecertification(compliancehouseholdid,oneid,ossiteid)
select chid,41,cs.udfgetsiteid() from compliancehousehold where chid not in (select compliancehouseholdid from annualrecertification where oneid = <ID>)

go

update CH
set reshprojectmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
,reshmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode in (6,7) and L.priorleaseid is null

go

update CH
set reshrhsnextannualdate = dateadd(yy,1,C.effectivedate)
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join RHCertification C
on CH.reshid = C.residenthouseholdid
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid and C.residenthouseholdid = CH.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode in (5,6) and L.nextleaseid is null and L.leainactivedate is null
and CH.reshstartdate = (select top 1 reshstartdate from Compliancehousehold where reshid = CH.reshid order by reshstartdate desc)
and C.id = (select top 1 id from RHcertification where residenthouseholdid = CH.reshid and Actionid in ('I','R') and statusid = 'SampleValue' order by effectivedate desc)

go

update AR
set effective = CH.reshrhsnextannualdate
from AnnualRecertification AR
inner join compliancehousehold CH
on AR.compliancehouseholdid = CH.chid
where AR.oneid = <ID>

go

insert into compliancehousehold(reshid,reshstartdate,reshprojectmoveindate,ossiteid)
select reshid,leamoveindate,leamoveindate,cs.udfgetsiteid() from Lease where codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and priorleaseid is null

go

Delete from AnnualNoticeDefinitionRecertification where AnnualRecertificationID in
(select ID  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid ))

Delete  from AnnualRecertification where ComplianceHouseholdID in (select C1.chid
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid )

delete C1
from compliancehousehold C1
join compliancehousehold C2
  on C1.reshID = C2.reshID
and C1.reshstartDate = C2.reshstartDate
and C1.chid < C2.chid

go

insert into annualrecertification(compliancehouseholdid,oneid,ossiteid)
select chid,34,cs.udfgetsiteid() from compliancehousehold where chid not in (select compliancehouseholdid from annualrecertification where oneid = <ID>)

update CH
set reshprojectmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
,reshmoveindate = L.leamoveindate
from ComplianceHousehold CH
inner join Lease L
on CH.reshid = L.reshid
where L.codeleasestatuscode IN (6, 7) and L.priorleaseid is null

go

update CH
set reshtcnextannualdate = dateadd(yy,1,TC.tcceffectivedate)
from compliancehousehold CH
inner join TCCertification TC
on CH.reshid = TC.reshid
where CH.reshstartdate = (select top 1 reshstartdate from compliancehousehold where reshid = CH.reshid order by reshstartdate desc)
and TC.tccid = (select top 1 tccid from TCCertification where reshid = TC.reshid and rsid = <ID> and rtid IN (<ID>, <ID>) order by tcceffectivedate desc)

go


update Compliancehousehold
set reshtcnextannualdate = datefromparts(year(reshtcnextannualdate), month(reshtcnextannualdate), 1)
where day(reshtcnextannualdate)>1

go

update AR
set effective = CH.reshtcnextannualdate
from AnnualRecertification AR
inner join compliancehousehold CH
on AR.compliancehouseholdid = CH.chid
where AR.oneid = <ID>
go
